titleStmt.title: Some manacles for a mad priest: or, Animadversions on William Jameson's preface to a book, lately published by him, called, Nazianzeni querela
titleStmt.author: Robertson, John.

notesStmt.note: Caption title on p. 3 reads: Some manacles for a mad priest, &c.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
